stripped_text: +1 mu You get +1 maximum hand size for each tag you have. The first time each turn a successful run on HQ or R&D ends, draw 1 card for each time you accessed a card during that run. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +1[mu] You get +1 maximum hand size for each tag you have. The first time each turn a successful run on HQ or R&D ends, draw 1 card for each time you accessed a card during that run. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Obelus

flavor: "In extremity, your conscience may make you terrible." -Omar Keung, the Flashpoint
stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a code gate, you may install this program from your heap. 3click: +2 strength. Then, if this program can interface with the code gate you are encountering, break up to 2 subroutines.
text: Whenever you encounter a code gate, you may install this program from your heap. 3[click]: +2 strength. Then, if this program can interface with the code gate you are encountering, break up to 2 subroutines.
title: Black Orchestra

stripped_text: click: Run Archives. If that run would be declared successful, change the attacked server to HQ or R&D for the remainder of that run. Use this ability only once per turn.
text: [click]: Run Archives. If that run would be declared successful, change the attacked server to HQ or R&D for the remainder of that run. Use this ability only once per turn.
title: Omar Keung: Conspiracy Theorist

flavor: Khan's avatar lifted her arm and the bird launched itself into the air.
stripped_text: Interface -> 1click: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 3click: +3 strength. 2click, add this program to your grip: Derez 1 code gate this program fully broke during this encounter.
text: Interface -> 1[click]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 3[click]: +3 strength. 2[click], add this program to your grip: Derez 1 code gate this program fully broke during this encounter.
title: Peregrine

flavor: My brain is the key that sets my mind free.
stripped_text: Interface -> 1click: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2click: +4 strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only by spending at least 1 credit from a stealth card.
text: Interface -> 1[click]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[click]: +4 strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only by spending at least 1 credit from a stealth card.
title: Houdini

flavor: "Live, unfiltered, and uncensored: this is Net Mercur, signing off for the night. Stay safe, New Angeles."
stripped_text: The first time you spend at least 1 credit from a stealth card each run, place 1 credit on Net Mercur or draw 1 card. Use credits on Net Mercur for anything.
text: The first time you spend at least 1[credit] from a stealth card each run, place 1[credit] on Net Mercur or draw 1 card. Use credits on Net Mercur for anything.
title: Net Mercur

flavor: All bioroids are bound by the Three Directives, but in theory a bioroid could have any number of core directives. Even zero.
stripped_text: Whenever you draw a card, reveal that card. The first time each turn you make a successful run, you may look at the top card of R&D.
text:
Whenever you draw a card, reveal that card.
The first time each turn you make a successful run, you may look at the top card of R&D.
title: Find the Truth

flavor: "Last week, I crossed the street to avoid her. Today, she pulled me out of the rubble. Makes me rethink who the bad guys are."
stripped_text: 2 credits: Draw 1 card. Use this ability only if you have suffered damage from a Corp card ability this turn.
text: 2[credit]: Draw 1 card. Use this ability only if you have suffered damage from a Corp card ability this turn.
title: First Responders

flavor: In battle, I take half the slain.
stripped_text: Lose click click click: Break up to 3 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine The Runner must pay 3click or trash 1 of their installed cards. Subroutine The Runner must pay 3click or trash 1 of their installed cards. Subroutine Do 1 brain damage or end the run.
text: Lose [click][click][click]: Break up to 3 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] The Runner must pay 3[click] or trash 1 of their installed cards. [subroutine] The Runner must pay 3[click] or trash 1 of their installed cards. [subroutine] Do 1 brain damage or end the run.
title: Fairchild 3.0

flavor: "If you live off-site, please consult the building AI for temporary housing. We regret that your off-site family cannot join you here while we are in lockdown..."
stripped_text: Name a card. Remove all copies of that card in the heap from the game.
text: Name a card. Remove all copies of that card in the heap from the game.
title: Ark Lockdown

flavor: "Wait a minute, I don't even have a cat."
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner trashed an accessed Corp card during his or her last turn. Trace 2 If successful, trash 2 installed non-program cards. If unsuccessful, take 1 bad publicity.
text:
Play only if the Runner trashed an accessed Corp card during his or her last turn.
<trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, trash 2 installed non-program cards. If unsuccessful, take 1 bad publicity.
title: Hellion Beta Test

stripped_text: When you score Project Kusanagi, place 1 agenda counter on it for each advancement token on it over 2. Hosted agenda counter: Choose 1 piece of ice to gain "Subroutine Do 1 net damage." after all its other subroutines for the remainder of this run.
text: When you score Project Kusanagi, place 1 agenda counter on it for each advancement token on it over 2. Hosted agenda counter: Choose 1 piece of ice to gain "[subroutine] Do 1 net damage." after all its other subroutines for the remainder of this run.
title: Project Kusanagi

flavor: When your ID is flagged with your genetic profile, "privacy"  doesn't really exist.
stripped_text: Subroutine Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2 credits. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2 credits. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2 credits.
text:
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2[credit].
title: DNA Tracker

stripped_text: Whenever the Runner takes at least 1 net damage, trash the top card of the stack.
text: Whenever the Runner takes at least 1 net damage, trash the top card of the stack.
title: Jinteki: Potential Unleashed

flavor: "She used to work for me at my chop shop. Now she makes more money than I do." -MacPherson
stripped_text: trash: Shuffle all cards in HQ into R&D. The Runner may pay any number of credits to prevent 1 random card in HQ from being shuffled into R&D for every 2 credits spent.
text: [trash]: Shuffle all cards in HQ into R&D. The Runner may pay any number of credits to prevent 1 random card in HQ from being shuffled into R&D for every 2[credit] spent.
title: Alexa Belsky

flavor: Observing is fun, but it's just the appetizer.
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner has fewer than 6 credits. As an additional cost to play this operation, remove 1 tag. Trash 1 installed card.
text:
Play only if the Runner has fewer than 6[credit].
As an additional cost to play this operation, remove 1 tag.
Trash 1 installed card.
title: Observe and Destroy

stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. As an additional cost to make the first run on his or her turn (even through a card ability), the Runner must spend 1 credit.
text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. As an additional cost to make the first run on his or her turn (even through a card ability), the Runner must spend 1[credit].
title: Service Outage

stripped_text: Play only if the Runner has at least 2 tags. As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Do 7 meat damage.
text:
Play only if the Runner has at least 2 tags.
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Do 7 meat damage.
title: BOOM!

stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. When the Runner's turn begins, trace 1 If successful, do 1 meat damage if the Runner is tagged; otherwise, give the Runner 1 tag.
text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. When the Runner's turn begins, trace 1 If successful, do 1 meat damage if the Runner is tagged; otherwise, give the Runner 1 tag.
title: Door to Door

flavor: The event is now referred to as the Water Tower Massacre. No one was ever indicted, and no one knows who paid the prisec team responsible.
stripped_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The install cost of each resource is increased by 2.
text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The install cost of each resource is increased by 2.
title: Scarcity of Resources
